title: Gorgeous 2 BD in RIVER NORTH~Full Amenity~Dogs Ok~Outdoor Pool~July 29
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Gorgeous newer property in River North! Send me your search criteria and I’ll find your perfect apartment!  SEAN HILL 517-282-4436  DOWNTOWN APARTMENT COMPANY Our expert service is always 100% free. Equal housing opportunity.
